mapper.sql: ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, COMMENTS, ENABLED, ISDEL, ORG_NAME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.update: UPDATE access_control_user SET PASSWORD = #{newPassword} WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName}
UPDATE access_control_user SET ISDEL = 'Y' WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from access_control_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ISDEL = 'N'

select
from access_control_user where 1=1 and ISDEL = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into access_control_user (ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, COMMENTS, ENABLED, ISDEL, ORG_NAME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update access_control_user
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
